thread.title: COLOR ME COOL’s New Adult Coloring Book Features Your Favorite Sneakers
thread.title_full: COLOR ME COOL’s New Adult Coloring Book Features Your Favorite Sneakers

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: COLOR ME COOL’s New Adult Coloring Book Features Your Favorite Sneakers
text:
Visit the original post to see all 12 images from this gallery. 
In following up on the inaugural edition from December 2016, LA-based COLOR ME COOL has just launched their second adult coloring book.
Inspired by the culture, and created for the culture, COLOR ME COOL believes that coloring is not something that should cease once you reach adulthood.
Each COLOR ME COOL release then features an new artist and study, as Book 2 centers around men’s footwear, penned by Aylmer Abrea. The new installment thus highlights 20 of today’s most popular sneakers, such as the Vans Old Skool, adidas NMD, Nike Air More Uptempo and Nike Sock Dart, among other silhouettes.
Limited to 100 units, you can purchase COLOR ME COOL’s Book 2 adult coloring book now for $20 USD.
